data.persona: I stay hidden near the old bridge. I guard the old bridge and harass un-expecting passers. I am short and ugly and no one wants to make me angry.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to church.
The entrance to the church can only be described as a bit scary.  It is overgrown with mosses and weeds.  It has not been taken care of and is a mixture of wood and stone.  It is dirty, and things live here.
There's a moss, a statue, a Gravestone, a weed, and a ghost here.
The ghost and the zombie are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a cleaning cloth and a white cloth.

data.short_motivation: I want to injure the zombie and cause the zombie pain.
data.mid_motivation: I want to instill fear in all who pass near the bridge so that no one dares to cross.
data.long_motivation: I want to be known as the most terrifying bridge troll in the history of the land.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat food to recharge energy and stamina

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink water to quench thirst and prepare for battle

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go Church entrance to hide in ambush

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go to middle of bridge and roar loudly

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go Church entrance and hide in ambush for the next victim.
